title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 121.5 - Effect of discipline by Judicial Conduct Commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 121.5 - Effect of discipline by Judicial Conduct Commission

State Regulations

Absent exceptional circumstances, as
determined by the Chief Administrator upon consultation with and agreement of
the Presiding Justice of the appropriate Appellate Division, no judge shall be
eligible to sit as a temporarily assigned justice pursuant to this Part for a
period of two years from the date of any order of the State Commission on

Judicial Conduct that directs that the judge be publicly admonished or
censured. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
121.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
